thread.title: Catherine MacVicar
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Catherine MacVicar

author: Catherine MacVicar
title: Catherine MacVicar
text: I ordered Wellington boots for my daughter. They arrived very quickly, but unfortunately were a bit small. I emailed Country Attire regarding exchange or refund. I received an email almost immediately, even on a Saturday, giving me full information of what was available if I required exchange or details offering a full refund. I returned the boots for exchange and received the new boots, peffect size, within days. I cannot complement this company enough. It is a pleasure to buy from them and certainly i would recommend them.
